name: Random Quote Machine
description: Clicking a button loads a third party random quote.

stories.name: Build the page
stories.description: Build the front end for the random quote machine
requirements: Use a high quality image as the background of the entire page
When the user clicks the button it should be replaced with a spinner
When the api call resolves the spinner should be replace by the button

stories.name: API call
stories.description: On user click make an API call to https://quotes.rest/
requirements: Include error handling, displaying errors via a toast
On success save the quote to state

stories.name: Displaying the quote
stories.description: On success of the API call display the quote to the user
requirements: Display the quote to the user below the Load Quote button
Since the page has an image background, ensure the test is displayed on a background for readability
The quote should transform and/or translate onto the page
